title: I have no idea what font this is...
content:
Need to add my school to a previously published brochure...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110208im_/http:/typophile.com/files/WhatFontPlease_6187.jpg)

Thanks for any assistance you can provide.

Monica
author: mmanuell

comments.content:
Serves you right for taking the time to compose a helpful post with more than one word and a link!

- Lex

:-D  
(I figured I was hopeless against your apparent winning streak anyway.)

I’m not sure if two threads make a streak. And I’ve been Renkoed and Hardwigged a lot recently.

- Lex
I don’t think the capital S is correct for Papyrus....

In the Letraset version of [Papyrus](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110208/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/papyrus/papyrus/charmap.html), the larger initials are alternate characters included in the same font, as you can see in the Character map.

- Mike Yanega

@Lex,  
Florianized seems to have a nicer ring to it, don’t you think? :)
